detectors.description:
name() should be declared external:
	- ERC20.name() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBurnFinance.sol#256-258)

symbol() should be declared external:

	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBurnFinance.sol#280-282)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBurnFinance.sol#287-289)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBurnFinance.sol#302-304)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBurnFinance.sol#309-312)

increaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.increaseAllowance(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MoonBurnFinance.sol#332-335)

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256) should be declared external:
